title: Arson Attack on St. George Church, Amhara Region
description: Unidentified individuals set fire to the historical perimeter of the St. George church at midnight. Local residents managed to extinguish the flames before they reached the inner sanctum.

title: Abduction of Pilgrims near Waldeba Monastery
description: A group of 15 pilgrims traveling on foot were intercepted by armed gunmen. Their whereabouts remain unknown as of this report.

title: Vandalism and Mass Killing in Oromia Zone
description: Reports indicate a violent targeted attack on a settlement resulting in several casualties and the destruction of three community chapels.

title: Attempted Fire Damage at Addis Ababa Cathedral
description: Suspected arson attempt during the Meskel festival preparations. Security intervened promptly.
Investigation revealed the smoke was caused by an electrical short circuit, not an intentional attack.

title: Abduction of Deacons from Rural Parish
description: Two deacons were taken from their residences late at night. Local authorities are investigating potential ransom motives.

title: Property Destruction in Benishangul-Gumuz
description: Large scale destruction of farmland and storage facilities belonging to the local EOTC diocese.
